item.title: Why It's Good To Be Wrong
item.description: Well, a redneck nerd in a bowling shirt was a-guzzlin’ lone star beer Talking religion and-uh politics for all the world to hear. –Kinky Friedman, They Aint’ Makin’ Jews Like Jesus Anymore I used to hate to be wrong. In fact, most of my life, I’d deny being wrong long after all doubt had left the room. I’d get angry when I was wrong, too. More accurately, I’d get angry when someone found out I was wrong.
